channel.title: politics on Just another data blog
channel.description: Recent content in politics on Just another data blog

item.title: Digital voting and blockchain, good or bad idea?
item.description: There have been some attempts to introduce digital in voting and more generally in the democratic process. Could blockchain enhance digital-based voting and help overcome some related challenges such as security?

item.title: Hacking Disinformation with the European External Action Service
item.description: I recently took part in the Disinformation Horizon Hackathon organised by the East StratCom Task Force dedicated to the fight against Russian disinformation using data.
